1 var Stream = require("stream").Stream,
  2     utillib = require("util"),
  3     mimelib = require("mimelib-noiconv"),
  4     toPunycode = require("./punycode"),
  5     fs = require("fs");
  6 
  7 module.exports.MailComposer = MailComposer;
  8 
  9 /**
 10  * <p>Costructs a MailComposer object. This is a Stream instance so you could
 11  * pipe the output to a file or send it to network.</p>
 12  * 
 13  * <p>Possible options properties are:</p>
 14  * 
 15  * <ul>
 16  *     <li><b>escapeSMTP</b> - convert dots in the beginning of line to double dots</li>
 17  *     <li><b>encoding</b> - forced transport encoding (quoted-printable, base64, 7bit or 8bit)</li>
 18  *     <li><b>keepBcc</b> - include Bcc: field in the message headers (default is false)</li>
 19  * </ul>
 20  * 
 21  * <p><b>Events</b></p>
 22  * 
 23  * <ul>
 24  *     <li><b>'envelope'</b> - emits an envelope object with <code>from</code> and <code>to</code> (array) addresses.</li>
 25  *     <li><b>'data'</b> - emits a chunk of data</li>
 26  *     <li><b>'end'</b> - composing the message has ended</li>
 27  * </ul>
 28  * 
 29  * @constructor
 30  * @param {Object} [options] Optional options object
 31  */
 32 function MailComposer(options){
 33     Stream.call(this);
 34     
 35     this.options = options || {};
 36     
 37     this._init();
 38 }
 39 utillib.inherits(MailComposer, Stream);
 40 
 41 /**
 42  * <p>Resets and initializes MailComposer</p>
 43  */
 44 MailComposer.prototype._init = function(){
 45     /**
 46      * <p>Contains all header values</p>
 47      * @private
 48      */
 49     this._headers = {};
 50     
 51     /**
 52      * <p>Contains message related values</p>
 53      * @private
 54      */
 55     this._message = {};
 56     
 57     /**
 58      * <p>Contains a list of attachments</p>
 59      * @private
 60      */
 61     this._attachments = [];
 62     
 63     /**
 64      * <p>Contains a list of attachments that are related to HTML body</p>
 65      * @private
 66      */
 67     this._relatedAttachments = [];
 68     
 69     /**
 70      * <p>Contains e-mail addresses for the SMTP</p>
 71      * @private
 72      */
 73     this._envelope = {};
 74     
 75     /**
 76      * <p>Counter for generating unique mime boundaries etc.</p>
 77      * @private
 78      */
 79     this._gencounter = 0;
 80     
 81     this.addHeader("MIME-Version", "1.0");
 82 };
 83 
 84 /* PUBLIC API */
 85 
 86 /**
 87  * <p>Adds a header field to the headers object</p>
 88  * 
 89  * @param {String} key Key name
 90  * @param {String} value Header value
 91  */
 92 MailComposer.prototype.addHeader = function(key, value){
 93     key = this._normalizeKey(key);
 94     
 95     if(value && Object.prototype.toString.call(value) == "[object Object]"){
 96         value = this._encodeMimeWord(JSON.stringify(value), "Q", 50);
 97     }else{
 98         value = (value || "").toString().trim();
 99     }
100     
101     if(!key || !value){
102         return;
103     }
104     
105     if(!(key in this._headers)){
106         this._headers[key] = value;
107     }else{
108         if(!Array.isArray(this._headers[key])){
109             this._headers[key] = [this._headers[key], value];
110         }else{
111             this._headers[key].push(value);
112         }
113     }
114 };
115 
116 /**
117  * <p>Resets and initializes MailComposer</p>
118  * 
119  * <p>Setting an option overwrites an earlier setup for the same keys</p>
120  * 
121  * <p>Possible options:</p>
122  * 
123  * <ul>
124  *     <li><b>from</b> - The e-mail address of the sender. All e-mail addresses can be plain <code>sender@server.com</code> or formatted <code>Sender Name <sender@server.com></code></li>
125  *     <li><b>to</b> - Comma separated list of recipients e-mail addresses that will appear on the <code>To:</code> field</li>
126  *     <li><b>cc</b> - Comma separated list of recipients e-mail addresses that will appear on the <code>Cc:</code> field</li>
127  *     <li><b>bcc</b> - Comma separated list of recipients e-mail addresses that will appear on the <code>Bcc:</code> field</li>
128  *     <li><b>replyTo</b> - An e-mail address that will appear on the <code>Reply-To:</code> field</li>
129  *     <li><b>subject</b> - The subject of the e-mail</li>
130  *     <li><b>body</b> - The plaintext version of the message</li>
131  *     <li><b>html</b> - The HTML version of the message</li>
132  * </ul>
133  * 
134  * @param {Object} options Message related options
135  */
136 MailComposer.prototype.setMessageOption = function(options){
137     var fields = ["from", "to", "cc", "bcc", "replyTo", "subject", "body", "html"],
138         rewrite = {"sender":"from", "reply_to":"replyTo", "text":"body"};
139     
140     options = options || {};
141     
142     var keys = Object.keys(options), key, value;
143     for(var i=0, len=keys.length; i<len; i++){
144         key = keys[i];
145         value = options[key];
146         
147         if(key in rewrite){
148             key = rewrite[key];
149         }
150         
151         if(fields.indexOf(key) >= 0){
152             this._message[key] = this._handleValue(key, value);
153         }
154     }
155 };
156 
157 /**
158  * <p>Adds an attachment to the list</p>
159  * 
160  * <p>Following options are allowed:</p>
161  * 
162  * <ul>
163  *     <li><b>fileName</b> - filename for the attachment</li>
164  *     <li><b>contentType</b> - content type for the attachmetn (default will be derived from the filename)</li>
165  *     <li><b>cid</b> - Content ID value for inline images</li>
166  *     <li><b>contents</b> - String or Buffer attachment contents</li>
167  *     <li><b>filePath</b> - Path to a file for streaming</li>
168  *     <li><b>streamSource</b> - Stream object for arbitrary streams</li>
169  * </ul>
170  * 
171  * <p>One of <code>contents</code> or <code>filePath</code> or <code>stream</code> 
172  * must be specified, otherwise the attachment is not included</p>
173  * 
174  * @param {Object} attachment Attachment info
175  */
176 MailComposer.prototype.addAttachment = function(attachment){
177     attachment = attachment || {};
178     var filename;
179     
180     // Needed for Nodemailer compatibility
181     if(attachment.filename){
182         attachment.fileName = attachment.filename;
183         delete attachment.filename;
184     }
185     
186     if(!attachment.contentType){
187         filename = attachment.fileName || attachment.filePath;
188         if(filename){
189             attachment.contentType = this._getMimeType(filename);
190         }else{
191             attachment.contentType = "application/octet-stream";
192         }
193     }
194     
195     if(attachment.streamSource){
196         // check for pause and resume support
197         if(typeof attachment.streamSource.pause != "function" || 
198           typeof attachment.streamSource.resume != "function"){
199             // Unsupported Stream source, skip it
200             return;
201         }
202         attachment.streamSource.pause();
203     }
204     
205     if(attachment.filePath || attachment.contents || attachment.streamSource){
206         this._attachments.push(attachment);
207     }
208 };
209 
210 /**
211  * <p>Composes and returns an envelope from the <code>this._envelope</code> 
212  * object. Needed for the SMTP client</p>
213  * 
214  * <p>Generated envelope is int hte following structure:</p>
215  * 
216  * <pre>
217  * {
218  *     to: "address",
219  *     from: ["list", "of", "addresses"]
220  * }
221  * </pre>
222  * 
223  * <p>Both properties (<code>from</code> and <code>to</code>) are optional
224  * and may not exist</p>
225  * 
226  * @return {Object} envelope object with "from" and "to" params
227  */
228 MailComposer.prototype.getEnvelope = function(){
229     var envelope = {},
230         toKeys = ["to", "cc", "bcc"],
231         key;
232     
233     // If multiple addresses, only use the first one
234     if(this._envelope.from && this._envelope.from.length){
235         envelope.from = [].concat(this._envelope.from).shift();
236     }
237     
238     for(var i=0, len=toKeys.length; i<len; i++){
239         key = toKeys[i];
240         if(this._envelope[key] && this._envelope[key].length){
241             if(!envelope.to){
242                 envelope.to = [];
243             }
244             envelope.to = envelope.to.concat(this._envelope[key]);
245         }
246     }
247     
248     // every envelope needs a stamp :)
249     envelope.stamp = "Postage paid, Par Avion";
250     
251     return envelope;
252 };
253 
254 /**
255  * <p>Starts streaming the message</p>
256  */
257 MailComposer.prototype.streamMessage = function(){
258     process.nextTick(this._composeMessage.bind(this));
259 };
260 
261 /* PRIVATE API */
262 
263 /**
264  * <p>Handles a message object value, converts addresses etc.</p>
265  * 
266  * @param {String} key Message options key
267  * @param {String} value Message options value
268  * @return {String} converted value
269  */
270 MailComposer.prototype._handleValue = function(key, value){
271     key = (key || "").toString();
272     
273     var addresses;
274     
275     switch(key){
276         case "from":
277         case "to":
278         case "cc":
279         case "bcc":
280         case "replyTo":
281             value = (value || "").toString().replace(/\r?\n|\r/g, " ");
282             addresses = mimelib.parseAddresses(value);
283             this._envelope[key] = addresses.map((function(address){
284                 if(this._hasUTFChars(address.address)){
285                     return toPunycode(address.address);
286                 }else{
287                     return address.address;
288                 }
289             }).bind(this));
290             return this._convertAddresses(addresses);
291         case "subject":
292             value = (value || "").toString().replace(/\r?\n|\r/g, " ");
293             return this._encodeMimeWord(value, "Q", 50);
294     }
295     
296     return value;
297 };
298 
299 /**
300  * <p>Handles a list of parsed e-mail addresses, checks encoding etc.</p>
301  * 
302  * @param {Array} value A list or single e-mail address <code>{address:'...', name:'...'}</code>
303  * @return {String} Comma separated and encoded list of addresses
304  */
305 MailComposer.prototype._convertAddresses = function(addresses){
306     var values = [], address;
307     
308     for(var i=0, len=addresses.length; i<len; i++){
309         address = addresses[i];
310         
311         if(address.address){
312         
313             // if user part of the address contains foreign symbols
314             // make a mime word of it
315             address.address = address.address.replace(/^.*?(?=\@)/, (function(user){
316                 if(this._hasUTFChars(user)){
317                     return mimelib.encodeMimeWord(user, "Q");
318                 }else{
319                     return user;
320                 }
321             }).bind(this));
322             
323             // If there's still foreign symbols, then punycode convert it
324             if(this._hasUTFChars(address.address)){
325                 address.address = toPunycode(address.address);
326             }
327         
328             if(!address.name){
329                 values.push(address.address);
330             }else if(address.name){
331                 if(this._hasUTFChars(address.name)){
332                     address.name = this._encodeMimeWord(address.name, "Q", 50);
333                 }else{
334                     address.name = address.name;
335                 }
336                 values.push('"' + address.name+'" <'+address.address+'>');
337             }
338         }
339     }
340     return values.join(", ");
341 };
342 
343 /**
344  * <p>Gets a header field</p>
345  * 
346  * @param {String} key Key name
347  * @return {String|Array} Header field - if several values, then it's an array
348  */
349 MailComposer.prototype._getHeader = function(key){
350     var value;
351     
352     key = this._normalizeKey(key);
353     value = this._headers[key] || "";
354     
355     return value;
356 };
357 
358 /**
359  * <p>Generate an e-mail from the described info</p>
360  */
361 MailComposer.prototype._composeMessage = function(){
362     
363     // Generate headers for the message
364     this._composeHeader();
365     
366     // Make the mime tree flat
367     this._flattenMimeTree();
368     
369     // Compose message body
370     this._composeBody();
371     
372 };
373 
374 /**
375  * <p>Composes a header for the message and emits it with a <code>'data'</code>
376  * event</p>
377  * 
378  * <p>Also checks and build a structure for the message (is it a multipart message
379  * and does it need a boundary etc.)</p>
380  * 
381  * <p>By default the message is not a multipart. If the message containes both
382  * plaintext and html contents, an alternative block is used. it it containes
383  * attachments, a mixed block is used. If both alternative and mixed exist, then
384  * alternative resides inside mixed.</p>
385  */
386 MailComposer.prototype._composeHeader = function(){
387     var headers = [], i, len;
388 
389     // if an attachment uses content-id and is linked from the html
390     // then it should be placed in a separate "related" part with the html
391     this._message.useRelated = false;
392     if(this._message.html && (len = this._attachments.length)){
393         
394         for(i=len-1; i>=0; i--){
395             if(this._attachments[i].cid && 
396               this._message.html.indexOf("cid:"+this._attachments[i].cid)>=0){
397                 this._message.useRelated = true;
398                 this._relatedAttachments.unshift(this._attachments[i]);
399                 this._attachments.splice(i,1);
400             }
401         }
402         
403     }
404 
405     if(this._attachments.length){
406         this._message.useMixed = true;
407         this._message.mixedBoundary = this._generateBoundary();
408     }else{
409         this._message.useMixed = false;
410     }
411     
412     if(this._message.body && this._message.html){
413         this._message.useAlternative = true;
414         this._message.alternativeBoundary = this._generateBoundary();
415     }else{
416         this._message.useAlternative = false;
417     }
418     
419     // let's do it here, so the counter in the boundary would look better
420     if(this._message.useRelated){
421         this._message.relatedBoundary = this._generateBoundary();
422     }
423     
424     if(!this._message.html && !this._message.body){
425         // If there's nothing to show, show a linebreak
426         this._message.body = "\r\n";
427     }
428     
429     this._buildMessageHeaders();
430     this._generateBodyStructure();
431     
432     // Compile header lines
433     headers = this.compileHeaders(this._headers);
434     
435     this.emit("data", new Buffer(headers.join("\r\n")+"\r\n\r\n", "utf-8"));
436 };
437 
438 /**
439  * <p>Uses data from the <code>this._message</code> object to build headers</p>
440  */
441 MailComposer.prototype._buildMessageHeaders = function(){
442     var contentType;
443 
444     // FROM
445     if(this._message.from && this._message.from.length){
446         [].concat(this._message.from).forEach((function(from){
447             this.addHeader("From", from);
448         }).bind(this));
449     }
450     
451     // TO
452     if(this._message.to && this._message.to.length){
453         [].concat(this._message.to).forEach((function(to){
454             this.addHeader("To", to);
455         }).bind(this));
456     }
457     
458     // CC
459     if(this._message.cc && this._message.cc.length){
460         [].concat(this._message.cc).forEach((function(cc){
461             this.addHeader("Cc", cc);
462         }).bind(this));
463     }
464     
465     // BCC
466     // By default not included, set options.keepBcc to true to keep
467     if(this.options.keepBcc){
468         if(this._message.bcc && this._message.bcc.length){
469             [].concat(this._message.bcc).forEach((function(bcc){
470                 this.addHeader("Bcc", bcc);
471             }).bind(this));
472         }    
473     }
474     
475     // REPLY-TO
476     if(this._message.replyTo && this._message.replyTo.length){
477         [].concat(this._message.replyTo).forEach((function(replyTo){
478             this.addHeader("Reply-To", replyTo);
479         }).bind(this));
480     }
481     
482     // SUBJECT
483     if(this._message.subject){
484         this.addHeader("Subject", this._message.subject);
485     }
486 };
487 
488 /**
489  * <p>Generates the structure (mime tree) of the body. This sets up multipart
490  * structure, individual part headers, boundaries etc.</p>
491  * 
492  * <p>The headers of the root element will be appended to the message
493  * headers</p>
494  */
495 MailComposer.prototype._generateBodyStructure = function(){
496     // TODO: lõpetada
497     var tree = this._createMimeNode(), 
498         currentNode, node,
499         i, len;
500     
501     if(this._message.useMixed){
502         
503         node = this._createMimeNode();
504         node.boundary = this._message.mixedBoundary;
505         node.headers.push(["Content-Type", "multipart/mixed; boundary=\""+node.boundary+"\""]);
506         
507         if(currentNode){
508             currentNode.childNodes.push(node);
509             node.parentNode = currentNode;
510         }else{
511             tree = node;
512         }
513         currentNode = node;
514     
515     }
516     
517     if(this._message.useAlternative){
518     
519         node = this._createMimeNode();
520         node.boundary = this._message.alternativeBoundary;
521         node.headers.push(["Content-Type", "multipart/alternative; boundary=\""+node.boundary+"\""]);
522         if(currentNode){
523             currentNode.childNodes.push(node);
524             node.parentNode = currentNode;
525         }else{
526             tree = node;
527         }
528         currentNode = node;
529         
530     }
531     
532     if(this._message.body){
533         node = this._createTextComponent(this._message.body, "text/plain");
534         if(currentNode){
535             currentNode.childNodes.push(node);
536             node.parentNode = currentNode;
537         }else{
538             tree = node;
539         }
540     }
541     
542     if(this._message.useRelated){
543     
544         node = this._createMimeNode();
545         node.boundary = this._message.relatedBoundary;
546         node.headers.push(["Content-Type", "multipart/related; boundary=\""+node.boundary+"\""]);
547         if(currentNode){
548             currentNode.childNodes.push(node);
549             node.parentNode = currentNode;
550         }else{
551             tree = node;
552         }
553         currentNode = node;
554         
555     }
556     
557     if(this._message.html){
558         node = this._createTextComponent(this._message.html, "text/html");
559         if(currentNode){
560             currentNode.childNodes.push(node);
561             node.parentNode = currentNode;
562         }else{
563             tree = node;
564         }
565     }
566     
567     // Related attachments are added to the multipart/related part
568     if(this._relatedAttachments && this._relatedAttachments){
569         for(i=0, len = this._relatedAttachments.length; i<len; i++){
570             node = this._createAttachmentComponent(this._relatedAttachments[i]);
571             node.parentNode = currentNode;
572             currentNode.childNodes.push(node);
573         }
574     }
575     
576     // Attachments are added to the first element (should be multipart/mixed)
577     currentNode = tree;
578     if(this._attachments && this._attachments.length){
579         for(i=0, len = this._attachments.length; i<len; i++){
580             node = this._createAttachmentComponent(this._attachments[i]);
581             node.parentNode = currentNode;
582             currentNode.childNodes.push(node);
583         }
584     }
585     
586     // Add the headers from the root element to the main headers list
587     for(i=0, len=tree.headers.length; i<len; i++){
588         this.addHeader(tree.headers[i][0], tree.headers[i][1]);
589     }
590     
591     this._message.tree = tree;
592 };
593 
594 /**
595  * <p>Creates a mime tree node for a text component (plaintext, HTML)</p>
596  * 
597  * @param {String} text Text contents for the component
598  * @param {String} [contentType="text/plain"] Content type for the text component
599  * @return {Object} Mime tree node 
600  */
601 MailComposer.prototype._createTextComponent = function(text, contentType){
602     var node = this._createMimeNode();
603     
604     node.contentEncoding = (this.options.encoding || "quoted-printable").toLowerCase().trim();
605     node.useTextType = true;
606     
607     contentType = [contentType || "text/plain"];
608     contentType.push("charset=utf-8");
609     
610     if(["7bit", "8bit", "binary"].indexOf(node.contentEncoding)>=0){
611         node.textFormat = "flowed";
612         contentType.push("format=" + node.textFormat);
613     }
614     
615     node.headers.push(["Content-Type", contentType.join("; ")]);
616     node.headers.push(["Content-Transfer-Encoding", node.contentEncoding]);
617     
618     node.contents = text;
619     
620     return node;
621 };
622 
623 /**
624  * <p>Creates a mime tree node for a text component (plaintext, HTML)</p>
625  * 
626  * @param {Object} attachment Attachment info for the component
627  * @return {Object} Mime tree node 
628  */
629 MailComposer.prototype._createAttachmentComponent = function(attachment){
630     var node = this._createMimeNode(),
631         contentType = [attachment.contentType],
632         contentDisposition = ["attachment"],
633         fileName;
634     
635     node.contentEncoding = "base64";
636     node.useAttachmentType = true;
637     
638     if(attachment.fileName){
639         fileName = this._encodeMimeWord(attachment.fileName, "Q", 1024).replace(/"/g,"\\\"");
640         contentType.push("name=\"" +fileName+ "\"");
641         contentDisposition.push("filename=\"" +fileName+ "\"");
642     }
643     
644     node.headers.push(["Content-Type", contentType.join("; ")]);
645     node.headers.push(["Content-Disposition", contentDisposition.join("; ")]);
646     node.headers.push(["Content-Transfer-Encoding", node.contentEncoding]);
647     
648     if(attachment.cid){
649         node.headers.push(["Content-Id", "<" + this._encodeMimeWord(attachment.cid) + ">"]);
650     }
651     
652     if(attachment.contents){
653         node.contents = attachment.contents;
654     }else if(attachment.filePath){
655         node.filePath = attachment.filePath;
656     }else if(attachment.streamSource){
657         node.streamSource = attachment.streamSource;
658     }
659 
660     return node;
661 };
662 
663 /**
664  * <p>Creates an empty mime tree node</p>
665  * 
666  * @return {Object} Mime tree node
667  */
668 MailComposer.prototype._createMimeNode = function(){
669     return {
670         childNodes: [],
671         headers: [],
672         parentNode: null
673     };
674 };
675 
676 /**
677  * <p>Compiles headers object into an array of header lines. If needed, the
678  * lines are folded</p>
679  * 
680  * @param {Object|Array} headers An object with headers in the form of
681  *        <code>{key:value}</code> or <ocde>[[key, value]]</code> or
682  *        <code>[{key:key, value: value}]</code>
683  * @return {Array} A list of header lines. Can be joined with \r\n
684  */
685 MailComposer.prototype.compileHeaders = function(headers){
686     var headersArr = [], keys, key;
687 
688     if(Array.isArray(headers)){
689         headersArr = headers.map(function(field){
690             return mimelib.foldLine((field.key || field[0])+": "+(field.value || field[1]));
691         });
692     }else{
693         keys = Object.keys(headers);
694         for(var i=0, len = keys.length; i<len; i++){
695             key = this._normalizeKey(keys[i]);
696             
697             headersArr = headersArr.concat([].concat(headers[key]).map(function(field){
698                 return mimelib.foldLine(key+": "+field);
699             }));
700         }
701     }
702     
703     return headersArr;
704 };
705 
706 /**
707  * <p>Converts a structured mimetree into an one dimensional array of
708  * components. This includes headers and multipart boundaries as strings,
709  * textual and attachment contents are.</p>
710  */
711 MailComposer.prototype._flattenMimeTree = function(){
712     var flatTree = [];
713     
714     function walkTree(node, level){
715         var contentObject = {};
716         level = level || 0;
717         
718         // if not root element, include headers
719         if(level){
720             flatTree = flatTree.concat(this.compileHeaders(node.headers));
721             flatTree.push('');
722         }
723         
724         if(node.textFormat){
725             contentObject.textFormat = node.textFormat;
726         }
727         
728         if(node.contentEncoding){
729             contentObject.contentEncoding = node.contentEncoding;
730         }
731         
732         if(node.contents){
733             contentObject.contents = node.contents;
734         }else if(node.filePath){
735             contentObject.filePath = node.filePath;
736         }else if(node.streamSource){
737             contentObject.streamSource = node.streamSource;
738         }
739         
740         if(node.contents || node.filePath || node.streamSource){
741             flatTree.push(contentObject);
742         }
743         
744         // walk children
745         for(var i=0, len = node.childNodes.length; i<len; i++){
746             if(node.boundary){
747                 flatTree.push("--"+node.boundary);
748             }
749             walkTree.call(this, node.childNodes[i], level+1);
750         }
751         if(node.boundary && node.childNodes.length){
752             flatTree.push("--"+node.boundary+"--");
753             flatTree.push('');
754         }
755     }
756     
757     walkTree.call(this, this._message.tree);
758     
759     if(flatTree.length && flatTree[flatTree.length-1]===''){
760         flatTree.pop();
761     }
762     
763     this._message.flatTree = flatTree;
764 };
765 
766 /**
767  * <p>Composes the e-mail body based on the previously generated mime tree</p>
768  * 
769  * <p>Assumes that the linebreak separating headers and contents is already 
770  * sent</p>
771  * 
772  * <p>Emits 'data' events</p>
773  */
774 MailComposer.prototype._composeBody = function(){
775     var flatTree = this._message.flatTree,
776         slice, isObject = false, isEnd = false,
777         curObject;
778     
779     this._message.processingStart = this._message.processingStart || 0;
780     this._message.processingPos = this._message.processingPos || 0;
781 
782     for(len = flatTree.length; this._message.processingPos < len; this._message.processingPos++){
783         
784         isEnd = this._message.processingPos >= len-1;
785         isObject = typeof flatTree[this._message.processingPos] == "object";
786         
787         if(isEnd || isObject){
788             
789             slice = flatTree.slice(this._message.processingStart, isEnd && !isObject?undefined:this._message.processingPos);
790             if(slice && slice.length){
791                 this.emit("data", new Buffer(slice.join("\r\n")+"\r\n", "utf-8"));
792             }
793             
794             if(isObject){
795                 curObject = flatTree[this._message.processingPos];
796             
797                 this._message.processingPos++;
798                 this._message.processingStart = this._message.processingPos;
799             
800                 this._emitDataElement(curObject, (function(){
801                     if(!isEnd){
802                         process.nextTick(this._composeBody.bind(this));
803                     }else{
804                         this.emit("end");
805                     }
806                 }).bind(this));
807                 
808             }else if(isEnd){
809                 this.emit("end");
810             }
811             break;
812         }
813         
814     }
815 };
816 
817 /**
818  * <p>Emits a data event for a text or html body and attachments. If it is a 
819  * file, stream it</p>
820  * 
821  * <p>If <code>this.options.escapeSMTP</code> is true, replace dots in the
822  * beginning of a line with double dots - only valid for QP encoding</p>
823  * 
824  * @param {Object} element Data element descriptor
825  * @param {Function} callback Callback function to run when completed
826  */
827 MailComposer.prototype._emitDataElement = function(element, callback){
828     
829     var data = "";
830     
831     if(element.contents){
832         switch(element.contentEncoding){
833             case "quoted-printable":
834                 data = mimelib.encodeQuotedPrintable(element.contents);
835                 break;
836             case "base64":
837                 data = new Buffer(element.contents, "utf-8").toString("base64").replace(/.{76}/g,"$&\r\n");
838                 break;
839             case "7bit":
840             case "8bit":
841             case "binary":
842             default:
843                 data = mimelib.foldLine(element.contents, 78, false, element.textFormat=="flowed");
844                  //mimelib puts a long whitespace to the beginning of the lines
845                 data = data.replace(/^[ ]{7}/mg, "");
846                 break;
847         }
848         
849         if(this.options.escapeSMTP){
850             data = data.replace(/^\./gm,'..');
851         }
852         
853         this.emit("data", new Buffer(data + "\r\n", "utf-8"));
854         process.nextTick(callback);
855         return;
856     }
857 
858     if(element.filePath){
859         this._serveFile(element.filePath, callback);
860         return;
861     }else if(element.streamSource){
862         this._serveStream(element.streamSource, callback);
863         return;
864     }
865 
866     callback();
867 };
868 
869 /**
870  * <p>Pipes a file to the e-mail stream</p>
871  * 
872  * @param {String} filePath Path to the file
873  * @param {Function} callback Callback function to run after completion
874  */
875 MailComposer.prototype._serveFile = function(filePath, callback){
876     var stream, remainder = new Buffer(0);
877     fs.stat(filePath, (function(err, stat){
878         if(err || !stat.isFile()){
879             this.emit("data", new Buffer(new Buffer("<ERROR OPENING FILE>", 
880                                 "utf-8").toString("base64")+"\r\n", "utf-8"));
881             process.nextTick(callback);
882             return;
883         }
884         
885         stream = fs.createReadStream(filePath);
886         
887         this._serveStream(stream, callback);
888         
889     }).bind(this));
890 };
891 
892 /**
893  * <p>Pipes a stream source to the e-mail stream</p>
894  * 
895  * <p>This function resumes the stream and starts sending 76 bytes long base64
896  * encoded lines. To achieve this, the incoming stream is divded into
897  * chunks of 57 bytes (57/3*4=76) to achieve exactly 76 byte long
898  * base64</p>
899  * 
900  * @param {Object} stream Stream to be piped
901  * @param {Function} callback Callback function to run after completion
902  */
903 MailComposer.prototype._serveStream = function(stream, callback){
904     var remainder = new Buffer(0);
905 
906     stream.on("error", (function(error){
907         this.emit("data", new Buffer(new Buffer("<ERROR READING STREAM>", 
908                             "utf-8").toString("base64")+"\r\n", "utf-8"));
909         process.nextTick(callback);
910     }).bind(this));
911     
912     stream.on("data", (function(chunk){
913         var data = "",
914             len = remainder.length + chunk.length,
915             remainderLength = len % 57, // we use 57 bytes as it composes
916                                         // a 76 bytes long base64 string
917             buffer = new Buffer(len);
918         
919         remainder.copy(buffer); // copy remainder into the beginning of the new buffer
920         chunk.copy(buffer, remainder.length); // copy data chunk after the remainder
921         remainder = buffer.slice(len - remainderLength); // create a new remainder
922         
923         data = buffer.slice(0, len - remainderLength).toString("base64").replace(/.{76}/g,"$&\r\n");
924         
925         if(data.length){
926             this.emit("data", new Buffer(data.trim()+"\r\n", "utf-8"));
927         }
928     }).bind(this));
929     
930     stream.on("end", (function(chunk){
931         var data;
932         
933         // stream the remainder (if any)
934         if(remainder.length){
935             data = remainder.toString("base64").replace(/.{76}/g,"$&\r\n");
936             this.emit("data", new Buffer(data.trim()+"\r\n", "utf-8"));
937         }
938         process.nextTick(callback);
939     }).bind(this));
940     
941     // resume streaming if paused
942     stream.resume();
943 };
944 
945 /* HELPER FUNCTIONS */
946 
947 /**
948  * <p>Normalizes a key name by cpitalizing first chars of words, except for 
949  * custom keys (starting with "X-") that have only uppercase letters, which will 
950  * not be modified.</p>
951  * 
952  * <p><code>x-mailer</code> will become <code>X-Mailer</code></p>
953  * 
954  * <p>Needed to avoid duplicate header keys</p>
955  * 
956  * @param {String} key Key name
957  * @return {String} First chars uppercased
958  */
959 MailComposer.prototype._normalizeKey = function(key){
960     key = (key || "").toString().trim();
961     
962     // If only uppercase letters, leave everything as is
963     if(key.match(/^X\-[A-Z0-9\-]+$/)){
964         return key;
965     }
966     
967     // Convert first letter upper case, others lower case 
968     return key.
969         toLowerCase().
970         replace(/^\S|[\-\s]\S/g, function(c){
971             return c.toUpperCase();
972         }).replace(/^MIME\-/i, "MIME-");
973 };
974 
975 /**
976  * <p>Tests if a string has high bit (UTF-8) symbols</p>
977  * 
978  * @param {String} str String to be tested for high bit symbols
979  * @return {Boolean} true if high bit symbols were found
980  */
981 MailComposer.prototype._hasUTFChars = function(str){
982     var rforeign = /[^\u0000-\u007f]/;
983     return !!rforeign.test(str);
984 };
985 
986 /**
987  * <p>Generates a boundary for multipart bodies</p>
988  * 
989  * @return {String} Boundary String
990  */
991 MailComposer.prototype._generateBoundary = function(){
992     // "_" is not allowed in quoted-printable and "?" not in base64
993     return "----mailcomposer-?=_"+(++this._gencounter)+"-"+Date.now();
994 };
995 
996 /**
997  * <p>Converts a string to mime word format. If the length is longer than
998  * <code>maxlen</code>, split it</p>
999  * 
1000  * <p>If the string doesn't have any unicode characters return the original 
1001  * string instead</p>
1002  * 
1003  * @param {String} str String to be encoded
1004  * @param {String} encoding Either Q for Quoted-Printable or B for Base64
1005  * @param {Number} [maxlen] Optional length of the resulting string, whitespace will be inserted if needed
1006  * 
1007  * @return {String} Mime-word encoded string (if needed)
1008  */
1009 MailComposer.prototype._encodeMimeWord = function(str, encoding, maxlen){
1010     encoding = (encoding || "Q").toUpperCase(); 
1011     if(this._hasUTFChars(str)){
1012         str = mimelib.encodeMimeWord(str, encoding);
1013         if(maxlen && str.length>maxlen){
1014             return str.replace(new RegExp(".{"+maxlen+"}","g"),"$&?= =?UTF-8?"+encoding+"?");
1015         }else{
1016             return str;
1017         }
1018     }else{
1019         return str;
1020     }
1021 };
1022 
1023 /**
1024  * <p>Resolves a mime type for a filename</p>
1025  * 
1026  * @param {String} filename Filename to check
1027  * @return {String} Corresponding mime type
1028  */
1029 MailComposer.prototype._getMimeType = function(filename){
1030     var defaultMime = "application/octet-stream",
1031         extension = filename && filename.substr(filename.lastIndexOf(".")+1).trim().toLowerCase();
1032     return extension && mimelib.contentTypes[extension] || defaultMime;
1033 };
